resources.string:
Welcome to Potluck!

Enter your ingredients, separated by commas and spaces, in their most general form. For instance, enter "cheese" instead of "cheddar." We will match you with recipes when you own at least half of their ingredients.

Let's get cooking!

string-array.name: recipes
string-array.item: Pesto Pasta, flour, egg, salt, basil, oil, nuts, cheese, .
Pizza, flour, egg, yeast, tomato, cheese, .
Eggplant Parmagiana, eggplant, tomato, garlic, bread, cheese, .
